sql-select.name: h_ServerInstance

sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS [trigger_h_ServerInstance_after_update] AFTER UPDATE ON [h_ServerInstance] FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE [h_ServerInstance] SET [DateUpdated] = DATETIME('now') WHERE [rowid] = new.[rowid]; END;

h_ServerInstanceLogiName
sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS [h_ServerInstanceLogiName] ( [DateCreated] [DATETIME] NOT NULL DEFAULT (DATETIME('now')) ,[DateUpdated] [DATETIME] NOT NULL DEFAULT (DATETIME('now')) ,[d_Query_id] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[h_ServerInstance_id] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[h_LogiName_id] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[LogiName] [TEXT] NULL );

sql-select.name: trigger_h_ServerInstanceLogiName
sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS [trigger_h_ServerInstanceLogiName] AFTER INSERT ON [h_ServerInstanceLogiName] FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE [h_ServerInstanceLogiName] SET [h_LogiName_id] = ( SELECT COALESCE(MAX(h.[h_LogiName_id]), 0) + 1 FROM [h_ServerInstanceLogiName] h WHERE h.[h_ServerInstance_id] = new.[h_ServerInstance_id] ) WHERE [h_ServerInstance_id] = new.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND [h_LogiName_id] = 0; END;

sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS [trigger_h_InstanceOSPerformanceCounterObjects] AFTER INSERT ON [h_InstanceOSPerformanceCounterObjects] FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE [h_InstanceOSPerformanceCounterObjects] SET [ObjectId] = ( SELECT COALESCE(MAX(h.[ObjectId]), 0) + 1 FROM [h_InstanceOSPerformanceCounterObjects] h WHERE h.[h_ServerInstance_id] = new.[h_ServerInstance_id] ) WHERE [h_ServerInstance_id] = new.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND [ObjectId] = 0; END;

sql-select.name: idx_h_InstanceOSPerformanceCounters_EventTime
sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS [idx_h_InstanceOSPerformanceCounters_EventTime] ON [h_InstanceOSPerformanceCounters] ( [h_ServerInstance_id] ,[ObjectId] ,[CounterId] ,[InstanceId] ,[EventTime] DESC );

sql-select.name: idx_h_InstanceOSPerformanceCounters_EventTime2
sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS [idx_h_InstanceOSPerformanceCounters_EventTime2] ON [h_InstanceOSPerformanceCounters] ( [h_ServerInstance_id] ,[ObjectId] ,[CounterId] ,[EventTime] DESC );

sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS [uidx_h_InstanceOSPerformanceCountersBaseline] ON [h_InstanceOSPerformanceCountersBaseline] ( [h_ServerInstance_id] ,[ObjectId] ,[CounterId] ,[InstanceId] ,[CounterType] );

sql-select.name: h_InstanceExecQueryText
sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS [h_InstanceExecQueryText] ( [DateCreated] [DATETIME] NOT NULL DEFAULT (DATETIME('now')) ,[DateUpdated] [DATETIME] NOT NULL DEFAULT (DATETIME('now')) ,[d_Query_id] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[h_ServerInstance_id] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[ExecQueryId] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[ExecQueryText] [TEXT] NULL );

sql-select.name: trigger_h_InstanceExecQueryText
sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS [trigger_h_InstanceExecQueryText] AFTER INSERT ON [h_InstanceExecQueryText] FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE [h_InstanceExecQueryText] SET [ExecQueryId] = ( SELECT COALESCE(MAX(h.[ExecQueryId]), 0) + 1 FROM [h_InstanceExecQueryText] h WHERE h.[h_ServerInstance_id] = new.[h_ServerInstance_id] ) WHERE [h_ServerInstance_id] = new.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND [ExecQueryId] = 0; END;

sql-select.name: uidx_h_InstanceExecQueryText
idx_h_InstanceExecQueryText_h_ServerInstance_id
h_InstanceExecQuery
sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS [h_InstanceExecQuery] ( [DateCreated] [DATETIME] NOT NULL DEFAULT (DATETIME('now')) ,[DateUpdated] [DATETIME] NOT NULL DEFAULT (DATETIME('now')) ,[d_Query_id] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[h_ServerInstance_id] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[DatabaseId] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[ExecQueryId] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[EventDay] [DATE] NOT NULL ,[EventTime] [DATETIME] NOT NULL ,[execution_count] [INTEGER] NULL ,[total_worker_time] [INTEGER] NULL ,[total_elapsed_time] [INTEGER] NULL ,[total_logical_reads] [INTEGER] NULL ,[total_logical_writes] [INTEGER] NULL );

sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS [h_InstanceExecProcedureName] ( [DateCreated] [DATETIME] NOT NULL DEFAULT (DATETIME('now')) ,[DateUpdated] [DATETIME] NOT NULL DEFAULT (DATETIME('now')) ,[d_Query_id] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[h_ServerInstance_id] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[DatabaseId] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[ProcedureId] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[ProcedureType] [TEXT] NULL ,[ProcedureName] [TEXT] NULL );

sql-select.name: uidx_h_InstanceExecProcedureName
h_InstanceExecProcedure
sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS [h_InstanceExecProcedure] ( [DateCreated] [DATETIME] NOT NULL DEFAULT (DATETIME('now')) ,[DateUpdated] [DATETIME] NOT NULL DEFAULT (DATETIME('now')) ,[d_Query_id] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[h_ServerInstance_id] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[DatabaseId] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[ProcedureId] [INTEGER] NOT NULL ,[EventDay] [DATE] NOT NULL ,[EventTime] [DATETIME] NOT NULL ,[execution_count] [INTEGER] NULL ,[total_worker_time] [INTEGER] NULL ,[total_elapsed_time] [INTEGER] NULL ,[total_logical_reads] [INTEGER] NULL ,[total_logical_writes] [INTEGER] NULL );

sql-select.name: idx_h_InstanceExecProcedure_EventDay
idxh_InstanceExecProcedure_EventTime
idx_h_InstanceExecProcedure_ProcedureId_EventDay
sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS [idx_h_InstanceExecProcedure_ProcedureId_EventDay] ON [h_InstanceExecProcedure] ( [h_ServerInstance_id] ,[DatabaseId] ,[ProcedureId] ,[EventDay] DESC );

sql-select.name: idxh_InstanceExecProcedure_ProcedureId_EventTime
sql-select.sql-select-text: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS [idxh_InstanceExecProcedure_ProcedureId_EventTime] ON [h_InstanceExecProcedure] ( [h_ServerInstance_id] ,[DatabaseId] ,[ProcedureId] ,[EventTime] DESC );

sql-select.name: h_InstanceNetworkInformationInfo
